text:
@NYGovCuomo So can incompetence.
March: NY State Health Dept issued directive forcing nursing homes to accept patients who had been discharged from hospitals after infections w/SARS-CoV-2. This mandate exacerbated the outbreak of COVID-19 in NY & neighboring states.  https://t.co/nQru4FpXaT
